participants.name: James Balatti
participants.title: MR.Tips- VP Sales at Virtual.Domains; CIO at iNoV8v Tech; Pres. Vancouver Technical User Group; Ops @ Sensible Vancouver

messages.message:
Glad to connect on LinkedIn.

I can't wait until I have a question to quiz your scientific methodology. 

Please let me know how we can create value by connecting. 

James
Www.Mr.Tips
I look forward to your questions ;)
How do keep up with technology?
I had that question in an interview and now I have a better answer.

Best interview question I've had was - how do you describe troubleshooting? Answer was Go from the general to the specific - and isolate the issue.

What was your answer in the interview?
I said read news and do some independent research. My answer now is something a boss said to me at my first job. "I want to work with people smarter than me" I would add younger and smarter
Best is always to find people smarter than you to work with. That's good advice.
